data.name: Business Overdraft
data.description: Provides cash flow relief with funds to cover business expenses, such as invoices and wages until you?re paid.

features.additionalInfo: No minimum or maximum amount (credit criteria apply)
Variable interest rate (fixed rate not available)
Easily manage and access your business overdraft via Online, Telephone, Mobile or Tablet Banking and via our ATM network.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product includes extra repayment features.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.

Temporary Overdraft is available for customers. Temporary Overdraft is a one-off short term working capital facility for existing business customers, with or without an existing overdraft agreement. Requests for new customers may be approved by a Credit Officer on an exception basis

eligibility.additionalInfo: A business entity or an individual 18 years and above, domiciled in Australia
Requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
Meets the credit criteria and credit policy requirements under an applicable offer for this product.

fees.name: Monthly Line Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Monthly Line Fee: 1.20% p.a. (of total limit) charged at the beginning of the month. Other fees may apply.
